mapper.select: SELECT sub_name, sub_type, sub_semester, sub_year, sub_info from subject_tb where sub_id = #{sub_id};
select sub_id, sub_name, sub_type, sub_semester, sub_year, sub_info from subject_tb where sub_name like concat('%', #{searchString}, '%');

select sub_tb.sub_year, sub_tb.sub_semester, sub_tb.sub_name, sub_tb.sub_type, subDe_tb.sub_detail_type, subDe_tb.sub_detail_exam, subDe_tb.sub_detail_project, subDe_tb.sub_detail_substitute from subject_detail_tb as subDe_tb join subject_tb as sub_tb on subDe_tb.sub_id = sub_tb.sub_id;

select sub_tb.sub_year, sub_tb.sub_semester, sub_tb.sub_name, sub_tb.sub_type, subDe_tb.sub_detail_type, subDe_tb.sub_detail_exam, subDe_tb.sub_detail_project, subDe_tb.sub_detail_substitute from subject_detail_tb as subDe_tb join subject_tb as sub_tb on subDe_tb.sub_id = sub_tb.sub_id where sub_tb.sub_name like concat('%', #{searchString}, '%');

select prof_tb.prof_id, prof_name, prof_img, prof_email, prof_tel, depart_name, group_concat(sub_name SEPARATOR ', ') as sub_name from professor_tb prof_tb join department_tb depart_tb on depart_tb.depart_id = prof_tb.depart_id join subject_tb sub_id on sub_id.prof_id = prof_tb.prof_id group by prof_id;
select notice_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_type, notice_view, notice_regdate, notice_file1 from notice_tb order by notice_regdate desc;

select notice_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_type, notice_view, notice_regdate, notice_file1 from notice_tb where notice_title like concat('%', #{searchString}, '%') order by notice_regdate desc;
select notice_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_type, notice_view, notice_regdate, notice_file1 from notice_tb where notice_id = #{notice_id};
